name: Space Horde (keenmustdie.xyz)
description:
TAKE ON THE MIGHTY PINK HORDE


You will never prevail.
How many will you bring down with you?


SPACE HORDE was my first game project. I made it over a few days as an initial approach to Scirra's Construct 2 engine and game creation in general. It's a tiny endless shooter designed for touch & mouse input. Despite its simplicity, I learned a great deal while making it and find playing with it quite enjoyable. Try to beat your high score!
